text: For sequences of order 200 nt, the approach appears to be able to capture the correct structure for the G-box structure (predicted in its entirety Fig. 2b ) [18] . An additional pseudoknot is also suggested (right hand side of the Figure) . The pseudoknot for Gbox can be predicted using a Kuhn length of 4 to 5 nt and invoking the effective Flory option.
